teacheasy.runtime.editor

Class AnswerProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.runtime.editor.AnswerProperty

  • public class AnswerProperty
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps an answer object in simple properties to allow it to be included in table rows in the properties pane.
    Version:
    1.0 21 Apr 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
